danata kaluthara, kolambaa, gampaha, mahanuwara saha mathara yana disawala bauddha katayuthu departhamenthuwe sahaya matha ema aayathana pawathwagena yana athara eewa adhapana amathyanshaye liyapadinchi kara adala katayuthu sidu kirimata balaporoththu we.eeta amatharawa aadhyathmika guna wagawada wardhanaya kirime aramunen ha 1 wasarata sisu darudariyan athulath kirime apahasuwada magaharawa ganimata adhyapana amathyathumage balaporoththuwa wanuye prathamika pasal adhyapanaya piriwen mattaminda kriyathmaka kirima sandaha pasale 1 –5 wasara dakwa sisu daru dariyanta prathamika adhyapana aayathana piriwen thula arambaimata yojitha we.
